meanings.definition: A person who assigns or transfers property or rights to another.
meanings.sent1: The assignors signed the document to transfer ownership of the house.
meanings.sent2: The assignors completed the paperwork to hand over the rights to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: The assignors accidentally swapped their keys and ended up in each other's houses!
meanings.sent4: The assignors were like busy bees, buzzing around to pass on their responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The assignors were like Santa Claus, giving away gifts of property and rights.

meanings.definition: Those who make an assignment or transfer of property or rights to another.
meanings.sent1: The assignors carefully planned the handover of the company shares.
meanings.sent2: The assignors discussed the terms of the property transfer with the new owners.
meanings.sent3: The assignors decided to play a game where they traded imaginary properties.
meanings.sent4: The assignors were like conductors orchestrating a symphony of property exchanges.
meanings.sent5: The assignors were like skilled painters, transferring the colors of ownership to new canvases.
